00034 // hack by Vangelis Haniotakis to handle the absence of $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] in IIS
00035 //
00036 if (php_sapi_name() != 'cli') {
00037         if (!isset($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'])) {
00038                 $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] = $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'] . '?' . $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'];
00039         }
00040 }

00343         public static function client($server_version, $server_hostname, $server_port, $server_uri, $start_session = true) {
00344                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL;
00345 
00346                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00347                 if (is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00348                         phpCAS :: error($PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['method'] . '() has already been called (at ' . $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['line'] . ')');
00349                 }
00350                 if (gettype($server_version) != 'string') {
00351                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_version (should be `string\')');
00352                 }
00353                 if (gettype($server_hostname) != 'string') {
00354                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_hostname (should be `string\')');
00355                 }
00356                 if (gettype($server_port) != 'integer') {
00357                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_port (should be `integer\')');
00358                 }
00359                 if (gettype($server_uri) != 'string') {
00360                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_uri (should be `string\')');
00361                 }
00362 
00363                 // store where the initializer is called from
00364                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00365                 $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL = array (
00366                         'done' => TRUE,
00367                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
00368                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
00369                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__
00370                 );
00371 
00372                 // initialize the global object $PHPCAS_CLIENT
00373                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT = new CASClient($server_version, FALSE /*proxy*/
00374                 , $server_hostname, $server_port, $server_uri, $start_session);
00375                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
00376         }
00377 
00392         public static function proxy($server_version, $server_hostname, $server_port, $server_uri, $start_session = true) {
00393                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL;
00394 
00395                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00396                 if (is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00397                         phpCAS :: error($PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['method'] . '() has already been called (at ' . $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL['line'] . ')');
00398                 }
00399                 if (gettype($server_version) != 'string') {
00400                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_version (should be `string\')');
00401                 }
00402                 if (gettype($server_hostname) != 'string') {
00403                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_hostname (should be `string\')');
00404                 }
00405                 if (gettype($server_port) != 'integer') {
00406                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_port (should be `integer\')');
00407                 }
00408                 if (gettype($server_uri) != 'string') {
00409                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $server_uri (should be `string\')');
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 // store where the initialzer is called from
00413                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00414                 $PHPCAS_INIT_CALL = array (
00415                         'done' => TRUE,
00416                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
00417                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
00418                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__
00419                 );
00420 
00421                 // initialize the global object $PHPCAS_CLIENT
00422                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT = new CASClient($server_version, TRUE /*proxy*/
00423                 , $server_hostname, $server_port, $server_uri, $start_session);
00424                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
00425         }

00442         public static function setDebug($filename = '') {
00443                 global $PHPCAS_DEBUG;
00444 
00445                 if ($filename != FALSE && gettype($filename) != 'string') {
00446                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $dbg (should be FALSE or the name of the log file)');
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 if (empty ($filename)) {
00450                         if (preg_match('/^Win.*/', getenv('OS'))) {
00451                                 if (isset ($_ENV['TMP'])) {
00452                                         $debugDir = $_ENV['TMP'] . '/';
00453                                 } else
00454                                 if (isset ($_ENV['TEMP'])) {
00455                                         $debugDir = $_ENV['TEMP'] . '/';
00456                                 } else {
00457                                         $debugDir = '';
00458                                 }
00459                         } else {
00460                                 $debugDir = DEFAULT_DEBUG_DIR;
00461                         }
00462                         $filename = $debugDir . 'phpCAS.log';
00463                 }
00464 
00465                 if (empty ($PHPCAS_DEBUG['unique_id'])) {
00466                         $PHPCAS_DEBUG['unique_id'] = substr(strtoupper(md5(uniqid(''))), 0, 4);
00467                 }
00468 
00469                 $PHPCAS_DEBUG['filename'] = $filename;
00470 
00471                 phpCAS :: trace('START phpCAS-' . PHPCAS_VERSION . ' ******************');
00472         }
00473 
00484         public static function backtrace() {
00485                 if (function_exists('debug_backtrace')) {
00486                         return debug_backtrace();
00487                 } else {
00488                         // poor man's hack ... but it does work ...
00489                         return array ();
00490                 }
00491         }
00492 
00500         public static function log($str) {
00501                 $indent_str = ".";
00502                 global $PHPCAS_DEBUG;
00503 
00504                 if ($PHPCAS_DEBUG['filename']) {
00505                         for ($i = 0; $i < $PHPCAS_DEBUG['indent']; $i++) {
00506                                 $indent_str .= '|    ';
00507                         }
00508                         error_log($PHPCAS_DEBUG['unique_id'] . ' ' . $indent_str . $str . "\n", 3, $PHPCAS_DEBUG['filename']);
00509                 }
00510 
00511         }
00512 
00521         public static function error($msg) {
00522                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00523                 $function = '?';
00524                 $file = '?';
00525                 $line = '?';
00526                 if (is_array($dbg)) {
00527                         for ($i = 1; $i < sizeof($dbg); $i++) {
00528                                 if (is_array($dbg[$i])) {
00529                                         if ($dbg[$i]['class'] == __CLASS__) {
00530                                                 $function = $dbg[$i]['function'];
00531                                                 $file = $dbg[$i]['file'];
00532                                                 $line = $dbg[$i]['line'];
00533                                         }
00534                                 }
00535                         }
00536                 }
00537                 echo "<br />\n<b>phpCAS error</b>: <font color=\"FF0000\"><b>" . __CLASS__ . "::" . $function . '(): ' . htmlentities($msg) . "</b></font> in <b>" . $file . "</b> on line <b>" . $line . "</b><br />\n";
00538                 phpCAS :: trace($msg);
00539                 phpCAS :: traceExit();
00540                 exit ();
00541         }
00542 
00546         public static function trace($str) {
00547                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00548                 phpCAS :: log($str . ' [' . basename($dbg[1]['file']) . ':' . $dbg[1]['line'] . ']');
00549         }
00550 
00554         public static function traceBegin() {
00555                 global $PHPCAS_DEBUG;
00556 
00557                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00558                 $str = '=> ';
00559                 if (!empty ($dbg[2]['class'])) {
00560                         $str .= $dbg[2]['class'] . '::';
00561                 }
00562                 $str .= $dbg[2]['function'] . '(';
00563                 if (is_array($dbg[2]['args'])) {
00564                         foreach ($dbg[2]['args'] as $index => $arg) {
00565                                 if ($index != 0) {
00566                                         $str .= ', ';
00567                                 }
00568                                 $str .= str_replace("\n", "", var_export($arg, TRUE));
00569                         }
00570                 }
00571                 if (isset($dbg[2]['file']))
00572                 $file = basename($dbg[2]['file']);
00573                 else
00574                 $file = 'unknown_file';
00575                 if (isset($dbg[2]['line']))
00576                 $line = $dbg[2]['line'];
00577                 else
00578                 $line = 'unknown_line';
00579                 $str .= ') [' . $file . ':' . $line . ']';
00580                 phpCAS :: log($str);
00581                 $PHPCAS_DEBUG['indent']++;
00582         }
00583 
00589         public static function traceEnd($res = '') {
00590                 global $PHPCAS_DEBUG;
00591 
00592                 $PHPCAS_DEBUG['indent']--;
00593                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00594                 $str = '';
00595                 $str .= '<= ' . str_replace("\n", "", var_export($res, TRUE));
00596                 phpCAS :: log($str);
00597         }
00598 
00602         public static function traceExit() {
00603                 global $PHPCAS_DEBUG;
00604 
00605                 phpCAS :: log('exit()');
00606                 while ($PHPCAS_DEBUG['indent'] > 0) {
00607                         phpCAS :: log('-');
00608                         $PHPCAS_DEBUG['indent']--;
00609                 }
00610         }

00629         public static function setLang($lang) {
00630                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT;
00631                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00632                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00633                 }
00634                 if (gettype($lang) != 'string') {
00635                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $lang (should be `string\')');
00636                 }
00637                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT->setLang($lang);
00638         }

00700         // ########################################################################
00701         //  PGT STORAGE
00702         // ########################################################################
00715         public static function setPGTStorageFile($format = '', $path = '') {
00716                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00717 
00718                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00719                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00720                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00721                 }
00722                 if (!$PHPCAS_CLIENT->isProxy()) {
00723                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00724                 }
00725                 if ($PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['done']) {
00726                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called before ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['method'] . '() (called at ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['line'] . ')');
00727                 }
00728                 if (gettype($format) != 'string') {
00729                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $format (should be `string\')');
00730                 }
00731                 if (gettype($path) != 'string') {
00732                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $format (should be `string\')');
00733                 }
00734                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT->setPGTStorageFile($format, $path);
00735                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
00736         }
00737 
00739         // ########################################################################
00740         // ACCESS TO EXTERNAL SERVICES
00741         // ########################################################################
00760         public static function serviceWeb($url, & $err_code, & $output) {
00761                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00762 
00763                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00764                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00765                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00766                 }
00767                 if (!$PHPCAS_CLIENT->isProxy()) {
00768                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00769                 }
00770                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['done']) {
00771                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after the programmer is sure the user has been authenticated (by calling ' . __CLASS__ . '::checkAuthentication() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::forceAuthentication()');
00772                 }
00773                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['result']) {
00774                         phpCAS :: error('authentication was checked (by ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['method'] . '() at ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['line'] . ') but the method returned FALSE');
00775                 }
00776                 if (gettype($url) != 'string') {
00777                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $url (should be `string\')');
00778                 }
00779 
00780                 $res = $PHPCAS_CLIENT->serviceWeb($url, $err_code, $output);
00781 
00782                 phpCAS :: traceEnd($res);
00783                 return $res;
00784         }
00785 
00803         public static function serviceMail($url, $service, $flags, & $err_code, & $err_msg, & $pt) {
00804                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00805 
00806                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00807                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00808                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00809                 }
00810                 if (!$PHPCAS_CLIENT->isProxy()) {
00811                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00812                 }
00813                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['done']) {
00814                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after the programmer is sure the user has been authenticated (by calling ' . __CLASS__ . '::checkAuthentication() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::forceAuthentication()');
00815                 }
00816                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['result']) {
00817                         phpCAS :: error('authentication was checked (by ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['method'] . '() at ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['line'] . ') but the method returned FALSE');
00818                 }
00819                 if (gettype($url) != 'string') {
00820                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $url (should be `string\')');
00821                 }
00822 
00823                 if (gettype($flags) != 'integer') {
00824                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $flags (should be `integer\')');
00825                 }
00826 
00827                 $res = $PHPCAS_CLIENT->serviceMail($url, $service, $flags, $err_code, $err_msg, $pt);
00828 
00829                 phpCAS :: traceEnd($res);
00830                 return $res;
00831         }

00856                         phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $header (should be `string\')');

00909 
00914         public static function checkAuthentication() {
00915                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00916 
00917                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00918                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00919                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00920                 }
00921 
00922                 $auth = $PHPCAS_CLIENT->checkAuthentication();
00923 
00924                 // store where the authentication has been checked and the result
00925                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00926                 $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL = array (
00927                         'done' => TRUE,
00928                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
00929                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
00930                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__,
00931                         'result' => $auth
00932                 );
00933                 phpCAS :: traceEnd($auth);
00934                 return $auth;
00935         }
00936 
00942         public static function forceAuthentication() {
00943                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00944 
00945                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00946                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00947                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00948                 }
00949 
00950                 $auth = $PHPCAS_CLIENT->forceAuthentication();
00951 
00952                 // store where the authentication has been checked and the result
00953                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00954                 $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL = array (
00955                         'done' => TRUE,
00956                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
00957                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
00958                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__,
00959                         'result' => $auth
00960                 );
00961 
00962                 if (!$auth) {
00963                         phpCAS :: trace('user is not authenticated, redirecting to the CAS server');
00964                         $PHPCAS_CLIENT->forceAuthentication();
00965                 } else {
00966                         phpCAS :: trace('no need to authenticate (user `' . phpCAS :: getUser() . '\' is already authenticated)');
00967                 }
00968 
00969                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
00970                 return $auth;
00971         }
00972 
00976         public static function renewAuthentication() {
00977                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
00978 
00979                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
00980                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
00981                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
00982                 }
00983 
00984                 // store where the authentication has been checked and the result
00985                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
00986                 $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL = array (
00987                         'done' => TRUE,
00988                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
00989                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
00990                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__,
00991                         'result' => $auth
00992                 );
00993 
00994                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT->renewAuthentication();
00995                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
00996         }

01004         public static function isAuthenticated() {
01005                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
01006 
01007                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
01008                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
01009                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
01010                 }
01011 
01012                 // call the isAuthenticated method of the global $PHPCAS_CLIENT object
01013                 $auth = $PHPCAS_CLIENT->isAuthenticated();
01014 
01015                 // store where the authentication has been checked and the result
01016                 $dbg = phpCAS :: backtrace();
01017                 $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL = array (
01018                         'done' => TRUE,
01019                         'file' => $dbg[0]['file'],
01020                         'line' => $dbg[0]['line'],
01021                         'method' => __CLASS__ . '::' . __FUNCTION__,
01022                         'result' => $auth
01023                 );
01024                 phpCAS :: traceEnd($auth);
01025                 return $auth;
01026         }

01049         public static function getUser() {
01050                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT, $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL;
01051                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
01052                         phpCAS :: error('this method should not be called before ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
01053                 }
01054                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['done']) {
01055                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::forceAuthentication() or ' . __CLASS__ . '::isAuthenticated()');
01056                 }
01057                 if (!$PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['result']) {
01058                         phpCAS :: error('authentication was checked (by ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['method'] . '() at ' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['file'] . ':' . $PHPCAS_AUTH_CHECK_CALL['line'] . ') but the method returned FALSE');
01059                 }
01060                 return $PHPCAS_CLIENT->getUser();

01299         public static function logout($params = "") {
01300                 global $PHPCAS_CLIENT;
01301                 phpCAS :: traceBegin();
01302                 if (!is_object($PHPCAS_CLIENT)) {
01303                         phpCAS :: error('this method should only be called after ' . __CLASS__ . '::client() or' . __CLASS__ . '::proxy()');
01304                 }
01305                 $parsedParams = array ();
01306                 if ($params != "") {
01307                         if (is_string($params)) {
01308                                 phpCAS :: error('method `phpCAS::logout($url)\' is now deprecated, use `phpCAS::logoutWithUrl($url)\' instead');
01309                         }
01310                         if (!is_array($params)) {
01311                                 phpCAS :: error('type mismatched for parameter $params (should be `array\')');
01312                         }
01313                         foreach ($params as $key => $value) {
01314                                 if ($key != "service" && $key != "url") {
01315                                         phpCAS :: error('only `url\' and `service\' parameters are allowed for method `phpCAS::logout($params)\'');
01316                                 }
01317                                 $parsedParams[$key] = $value;
01318                         }
01319                 }
01320                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT->logout($parsedParams);
01321                 // never reached
01322                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
01323         }
01324

01337                 }
01338                 $PHPCAS_CLIENT->logout(array (
01339                         "service" => $service
01340                 ));
01341                 // never reached
01342                 phpCAS :: traceEnd();
01343         }
